name: Police ATV Simulator: City Quad Bike Racing Full
name_original: Police ATV Simulator: City Quad Bike Racing Full
description:
Feel like a real policeman on duty playing these unusual police chase simulator in 3D!

After a massive rebel in city prison, hundreds of criminals have broken free and flooded the streets like a stream of scum! Pushers, prostitutes, robbers, murderers – all of them transformed your home town into a pit of thugs!
You’re the only hope of peaceful citizens – a special policeman, armed and riding on and ATV! Join the war police forces waged against criminals, patrol city blocks and prevent crime activity! Become a real hero with Police ATV Simulator: City Quad Bike Racing 3D!

Race on your powerful machine - the police ATV – and earn money for each caught criminal! Use earned money to raise up your vehicle characteristics, or even to buy a new one! Do your best and save the city from the criminal scum!

Police ATV Simulator: City Quad Bike Racing 3D features:
Ultimate police chase simulator!
Start the chase through the city streets
Wide range of missions – find and catch all criminals
Earn points to buy new ATV

Chase the fugitive criminals, catch them and transfer them to the prison with Police ATV Simulator: City Quad Bike Racing 3D!
